content.detailedDescription:
As i was sitting watching tv with my father, we were reading of our friends on facebook who had seen an apparent ufo about 10 miles or so down the road.  thinking they were just seeing a plane we ignored it. while i was on my way to the bathroom i hear my father yell for me. as i come running out i see this orb in the sky, in the same direction and manor that our friends had reported.  we both stood in awe as i yelled for my mother.  she was too late to see it the first time as it simply disappeared.  my father isn't sure what caught his eye but i studied the sky and sure enough, about 5 degrees lower another orb appeared alternating from red, green, yellow, white and grey in color.  as soon as i saw it i futures it was a plane until i noticed the multiple colors, which i have never seen on an airplane, especially since it was stationary and still i knew it couldn't have been a plane.  
it was simply multiple colors, shaped as an orb that kept alternating colors until it vanished, perhaps reappearing or maybe it was another one, about 5 degrees lower than its first location.  
while standing there i began to freak out in all honesty.  my immediate reaction was to call a buddy at the local abc station who said he would look into it, which in a way calmed me down.. perhaps making me realize that whatever happens, happens and it was indeed a ufo. unfortunately the object hasn't returned yet, though i'm sure it will be back sometime tonight, i'll be watching!
content.summary: Orb-like with multiple, randomly changing colors

content.detailedDescription: My son looked outside and observed a bright white light towards the west of where we live. we figured it was a plane but then the light never moved. it was stationary for 10 mins, then got bright and blinked out. then a few minutes it reappeared and was gone within a matter of minutes. we have waited for it to reappear and it hasn't. we we're excited and nervous and most of all curious to know what we had seen in the night sky.
content.summary: Seen a white light hovering over airspace towards the west towards national guard.

content.detailedDescription: We were vacationing in las vegas last spring break. we were sightseeing and i was taking pictures with my cell phone. i dont remember if we were on a bus or walking at the time but if we were on the bus i dont remember and ceiling lights that could have created the image. any ways i did not notice the object or reflection until i got home a few days later. i did not photoshop the image and dont even know how to do it if i wanted to. the image shows a somewhat transparent saucer shape. i emailed mufon and he did a preliminary assessment and he noticed a dark object at the top left of the photo that i did not see until he pointed it out. i am a person that doesnt like drawing attention to themselves. i simply cannot explain what is on my photo and am seeking help explaining the out of place object. i will provide everything i can to prove i didnt fake the photo if needed. i will send the photo but it needs to be rotated so i will send the original photo and the rotated photo for viewing. also i will send the details of both photos that were saved by the phone before and after the rotation.
content.summary: Photo taken on vacation in las vegas. was not even noticed till days later

content.detailedDescription: Was driving and dark so couldn't make out if it was a plane or helicopter which was chasing 2 balls of blueish light not blinking which was strange enough that i actually stopped in the middle of the road to watch. the two balls of light became one ball and made a maneuver over highway 94 with plane still chasing. seen from cottage grove.
content.summary: Plane or helicopter chasing after 2 blue balls of light that merged into one ball of light

content.detailedDescription: We were at a large open beautiful graveyard with a video camera. after dinner we decided to go out together for the first time to try to catch spirits on film and also to walk down this spooky trail we saw the first time  visiting the graveyard. so here we are, the second time visiting the graveyard. we have the film footage from the entrance in the graveyard to the exit out. what made me notice these weird happenings was when i analyzed the footage looking for ghost that we hopefully caught on film. i did not see any ghosts but boy do we get a lot more! first we catch a voice come in when we were laying down in front of camera starting to make love. all you see is our feet because i forgot to push the record button off. then on the way around the outskirts of the graveyard i witnessed on film an object fly from miles away from us going thousands mile per hour come up to car at an instant halt, hover left to right before zipping off to the right but not near as fast as it came up on us.
content.summary: Wierd ufo came up on us in a site where we were ghosthunting. caught it on film. coolest thing i ever experienced and i have a son that was born

content.detailedDescription: Was standing on the south side of my house at 9 pm and witnessed a bright pulsing light changing colors from white to orange to red.Was moving through a low cloud base from the sw to the ne. object was moving at around 250mph and about 600 feet off the ground.About five minutes later the same light came through the same flight path. no sound was heard on either encounter.There was a light rain at the time of both encounters. was not an airplane.
content.summary: Metro orlando dual lights changing colors in the clouds at night at low level with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside and just above the tree lines above my steps was a yellow glowing light with red flames shooting from it, at times really bright then not so bright. it went in a straight line with no sound and just keep going straight and what seemed like up up up till it was so tiny i couldn't see it anymore. there was one other person outside with me that saw the same thing, then we saw more then normal planes in the sky and also saw one bright white light with no sound as well. i was really excited and i do believe it was a ufo of some sort both the yellow ball with flames and the bright white light. i wished i had my camera on me so i could have taped it.
content.summary: Orange ball with bight flame of red glowing bright and then light. flew straight and got smaller as it flew away

content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure what i saw and i know i have bad eyes but my brother, father and mother all saw it and ran out side to see this thing fly over the house.

this thing was so bright we thought maybe it was the space station but there was no blinking lights and the space station was not located over my property at this time.

the light was very bright and looked like a star how ever it looked like it was in the upper atmosphere and had three grey light beams going in multiple directions.

this thing had one grey light beam going directly under it and another two at angles of north and south just angled off the main beam directly under it.


my brother was yelling come look come look and so i came outside and could not figure out what the heck i was looking at and we noticed planes going by in the same direction a lot lower then the thing we was observing.

my brother had it on his phone trying to determine what it was but the phone came back with nothing and the object was moving very slow.

i would not be surprised if others in the area saw the same thing we was looking at for a good 5-10 minutes.

i wish my brother took a picture but i can explain it as clear as day because it just happened  and started at 9:30 pm eastern and ended at 9:40 pm eastern after it went over the tree line and i could not see it any more.

this is the first time i have ever seen any thing like it how ever my dad has seen this object before 20 or so years ago or at least an object like it that he cant explain.

i figured it is best to document the event as best i can while it is still fresh in my mind.

i have autism spectrum and i know what i saw and some things will stick for a life time and this will most likely be one of them unless said object can be explained.
content.summary: Bright white light, no sound, light grey beams

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my garden when i saw a bright light suddenly appear in the sky to the south west, it was heading east then it appeared to start coming towards my house then changed direction again back towards the east and just carried on, it looked to fly over the village, when i first noticed it i thought it was a bright star but it was moving, it seemed to pretty quickly but made absolutely no noise what so ever, the object was small and emmitted a brilliant white light, i was dumbstruck when i first saw it trying to figure out what it was and after it left i was excited, it seemed to change direction twice, very smoothly and it then disappeared from viewinto the clouds heading towards the town of ramsgate
content.summary: It flew over from south west, came directly towards my house then went east

content.detailedDescription:
The witness was on his 3rd floor balcony at his apartment complex, he saw a black boomerang shaped object with reddish-orange dim oval lights under
its wing tips silently approach his building until it was 300 feet away
from the roof line. as it continued on a straight line path, it suddenly
stopped and then made a 90 degree turn to the heavens. it accelerated away
at unbelievable speed and faded away into the distance. the witness was
in shock and awe at the speed and manuverability of the object. 
he realized that this was not a man made object. the object approached from
the nw and flew off to the sw. the temperature was chilly with overcast
sky and medium fog. there was no precipatation. the sighting was 5-6 seconds in duration. there was a "weird quiet" feeling in the air during
the sighting.

this was a second sighting of the same vehicle by this witness within a 5
day period. if you would like to refer to the details of the first sighting
it is under case #47499.
content.summary: The ufo was 300 feet from me as i stood on my 3rd floor balcony. it flew aways, stopped, then made a 90 degree turn. it accelerated away and faded into the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
This report is not a snap decision, but after thinking on it for week and a half i have decided to relate it, real or not.
at approx. three pm, monday the 27th of may 2013 i was passing by twin hills park in crestview, fl. i happened to glance down down the hill into the park where children played as their families watched.
as i began to turn my attention back to the road i saw a completely black, slim, man-shaped shadow spring from the ground and grip either the trunk of a small tree or a power pole with hands and the balls of its feet. i estimate the figure to be a bit over five feet tall. before i could get a substantial second look the thing disappeared up behind thick foliage of a tree. i had the eeriest feeling that it was watching the children as if they were prey.
yeah i know it sounds nuts, but i wonder if there are previous reports of something similar.
after contemplating this for a week i remembered that i had seen a ufo just across the road from the park about three years ago in december.
content.summary: Black, man-shaped entity

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of may 31, 2013, around 2215hrs, was looking straight up in sky at the big dipper. observed 2 satellites moving from s/w to n/e, several minutes apart in same flight path through handle of the big dipper. at 2234hrs noticed a bright light turn on then off. noticed a faint pin point of light stationary from point of bright light. shortly afterwards observed an aircraft moving from mostly west to east and it crossed between last to handle stars before ladle of dipper. after passing through the stars a sudden bright light came on and moved west a hi speeds, turned off then the light came on, still moving west, then disappeared. this lasted less than a second. was this some type of laser experiment?
content.summary: Bright light flashed from stationary object, satellite? the another flash with sudden movement lasted about one second

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out in the window on the second floor. i felt sommeone was looking at me from outside it was night and saw no one but suddenly i felt it was over my head and looked up on our house roof and saw a black triangled spaceship had parked on our roof.

i did not think before i was pulled out from the window and lifted up in the air.

there was no sound from it and it was black in a special color that not reflected light.

the next memory was that i saw a circle-formed grey spacship and i was looking if it had any number or letter on it as i thought it was an airplane and only 8 km is a small military airport.

i was try to see if there was any living i could see in the small windows but it was only dark in them.

i was never frighten.

when i come back to my house was i standing on the same spot and i heard our tv and it was like they had stop the time and i could feel like i was flying from another dimension to another as it was like bump in time.

next day did the whole family waked up of a swish sounds outside and we looked in a window and saw small like a volvo car size circle formed grey spaceship flying up in our forest. they was at least 50

my man and our daughter drove up in the forest to see the spaceship but they was gone.

it was one area in the forest i never pass by again because i felt like someone looked at me and i knew they had taaken me to that place.

my whole life changed after this event. i joined the airforce and become a sergeant working with ham-radio and maps

i left my man  and married a man in texas and his parents had worked for nasa for 45 years working with maps.

i have been visited in most of my life and they have talked to me. they have also trained me to sit in the air and they have taken foster from me and i think they have used my body to breed on and then take them out because i have been pregnant 15 times without the doctor could see any foster only the placenta.

they have taken my kids because i have so much love in me and emotion is something they not have. they do not feel anything and not understand that they can hurt us in their examination of people.
content.summary: When looking out in the window a spaceship had parked on our house roof.

content.detailedDescription: I was out driving when i decided that i wanted to take a picture of the full moon. i was sitting in the front passenger seat and snapped a photo, with my cell phone, out the car window, looking south. later when i had arrived to where i was headed i went to upload the photo and noticed a glowing white object next to the moon. i thought it was strange because there were clouds in front of the object. i was hoping that you could help me identify what it is and let me know. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Taking picture of the full moon looking south

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting in camp at zion natl park during early evening hours, still light out, when a bright glowing light (object) appeared in front of me in clear sight. it had the flight characteristics of a bird or bat. i thought at first it might be someone with a pinpoint light of some sort clowning around, but i've never heard of a white light that could focus like a laser. i then noticed it was three dimentional in appearence and was clearly in the air. it first appeared to be about 1/4 mile away and flying like a bird or bat or? it flew to the top of the mountain range approx. 1 1/2 miles to my front, flew right to left skimming the top surface of the range and dissapeared from sight to the north. as the days go by i'm starting doubt my memory but at the time i was sure that what i saw was odd at best and not my amagination.
content.summary: I was at zion natl park in camp looking in the direction of the event when it flew into view, flew around like a bird or bat went above the mountain range in front of me and then flew away northward

content.detailedDescription:
, i have always been a sceptic when it comes to ufo,s and aleins how ever about 2 months ago around 1 pm i looked up and saw 3 to 4 orbs following behind a airplane then out of no where they changed course it was like they where putting on a show. 
so since thenjust about ever ynight me and my husband come outside at night and just look up at the sky and we see flying objects in the sky. sometimes 3 or 4
   they look like flying stars but go really fast and change direction with ease. 
i have even pointed a light at one and got flashed back it scared me very much.
 i dont talk about what i see with no one except my husband i think people will think im crazy...But  

     last night i saw the brightist bigest ufo it was 11 pm and me and my husband where outside looking up and we saw what looked like a star but it was moving very fast and then it got brighter and brighter it just glided across the sky it was very surreal. we saw it for about 10 min intill we couldnt see it no more due to trees then about a hour later we saw anther one but im sure tonight we will see something like its happing every night . what i want to know is why are we seeing things almost every night are we the only ones that find objects flying all the time are there other people that see things liked this, am i seeing what i think im seeing? are they satellites?  i dont know but i know im scared and not sure whats going to happen are we going to be invaded or does the goverment already have contact im just not sure but im sure i sound crazy but im really not  i am a normal person. i would love some answers. i know for sure if someone would stand with me for 10 or 15 min you would see something unknown flying above.
 is there any one else that see things like us every night? as soon as we fix our camera we get video we tried but are camera broke it wont turn back on and i have tried my cell phone but u cant see anything
content.summary: Why do i keep seeing ufos? im scared i dont know what to think.

content.detailedDescription:
On friday may 24, 2013 at around 20:30 to 20:35 hours after dinner.   i experienced with my family a very strange event that unfolding before our very eyes.

at 20:15 we finished dinner at my mother-in-law's place which at  aventura florida.  i too live in the adjacent building within the same complex.   her building and view points almost due north between 350 to 355 degrees.  we live approximately 1 mile south of the miami-dade/broward county line or north miami dade in the city of aventura.

my family member calls me to the balcony at 20:32, shortly after sundown.  upon my arrival i noticed the "cloud" was getting brighter and brighter as well as larger.  the brighter it got the larger it got or vice a versa.  there was no external light pointed at this cloud and the truth is that this cloud was in fact self-luminescent.  this cloud was almost due north at around the county line (1 mile) and at my estimate of 800 to 900 feet high and very low in the sky.  i estimate this cloud was between 450 to 500 wide with a girth of 200 feet.   

i quickly ran for my iphone at what i estimate the brightest point and started filming.  i quickly panned the skies to ensue one more time no exterior lights where pointed at this "cloud."  this "cloud" had a small that behaved in the same exactly the way.  another point that was barely viable with the naked eye was that the center had a define sphere rotating ever so slow clockwise with the cloud while at the same the cloud with no movement.  

the entire event took less than 3 to 4 minutes.  the commentary in the background was that of my family members.  at first she was sarcastic and then serious (in russian).  i too made a comment in russian (malinki/small) referring to the small tail attached to the cloud.
content.summary: Self-luminescent cloud with rotating sphere inside

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving from ny to pa, a common trip for me.  major highway 287 s/w.  heading west.  clearly saw three bright stationary lights, looked brighter than stars.  i always look at the stars, and never saw anything like this- this distinct.  one of the lights was brighter than the other two.  three lights were in perfect triangular formation.  many miles high, many miles away.  i took pictures and video, but not sure if it is visible.  thousands of people must have seen it, because it was just above mountainline.   sun had set maybe a half hour before and there was still some light in the sky.

i lost sight of the objects when the road curved south, but then had a good view again when the road turned west.  the three lights were there for at least ten to fifteen minutes, maybe longer.  i drove south and lost sight.


when i first saw the objects i felt elation and certainty this was an intelligent formation.  my intuition said "sirian", but this is an opinion.  i welcomed them with my thoughts and told them to stay as long as they liked.   i thanked the lights.  i was very grateful to see it.  


i always go on walks at night, always looking for lights or ships, and have not seen anything like this since the mass ufo sightings in the hudson river valley in the 80's.  

can provide media evidence at a later date- need to download it to computer.
content.summary: Three bright lights in western sky hovering in perfect triangle formation, low in sky

content.detailedDescription: It was around 1am after going out for a smoke i noticed what i first thought was a star flashing rapidly in the night sky. after watching it for about five minutes i came to realise that it was flashing to violent and to close to be a star. after the first five minutes passed a second object that looked like the first one came in from the left and stop within a couple of meters of the first craft, then the second object stopped and stayed static for a couple of minutes until it started to flight to the right, after the object moved out of my field of view (behind houses) the first object started to fly in the same path of the second object. being as this isn't my first encounter of a ufo i wasn't two shocked about seeing it as im a strong believer that we've been visited.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two glowing orbs, one static in the sky and the second moving from left to right.

content.detailedDescription: Going through some google earth pics and there is a picture of a man walking in a desert climate, and in the sky, above the mountain, is a dark orb.  it doesn't look like a bird or any aircraft i am familiar with.  i reported this before and never got any response.  everytime i view the picture it puzzles me.  i am attaching the photo.  i put a location, time and date in the required fields on this form, but they are wrong since i was not there, i do not know the man in the photo and have no clue where he was or what the date and time were.  i am sure i can find out though.
content.summary: Going through some google earth photos and noticed an orb in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure but i believe that i have been abducted many times. i believe that it started back in the late 1980's. there are several stories from waking in the middle of being taken out of my house by this tall being when i was stationed on crete, greece, to several recent ones. the reason i am reaching out now is because of the recent episodes and questions i have. i recently woke up with a round patch, about 1.5 inches in diameter, of hair missing from the left side of my head (above and to the left of my ear) to teeth that i think were pulled and put back. as for the teeth, i just woke up one day and had 2 very loose molars on the right bottom side of my jaw. they did hurt but that only lasted a few days. they are still loose but without pain. in november i awoke in the middle of another episode. i was in a hotel room and woke up hearing chirping sounds going back and forth. i was covered from head to toe in a white sheet and was surrounded in very bright white light. i felt something at the foot end and tried to kick at it as i was very upset. i just got heavier and could no longer move. i felt something near my shoulder at this point. i did try yelling for it to leave me alone. i know i got a few words out but again was only left heavier than before and unable to move or speak. i just kept hearing the chirping going on. i eventually just blacked out.  when i woke up in the morning i felt extremely heavy with difficulty moving. i had a very hard time getting out of bed and to the shower. i had to give a speech at a university and as i was being led to the room i had extreme difficulty going up 2 steps. i fell back once and just pushed myself back to move on. at the same time i was in an extreme feeling of paranoia for a few hours. i had to sit outside for a while just to pull myself together. anybody that knows me knows that i don't fear much of anything. i have been awakened a few times in the middle of something going on. on other occasions i have been aware of something going on but couldn't open my eyes but tried fighting my way out just to be completely unable to move while getting some words out - yelling for my freedom.
i have twice seen the tall thin creature with the large head and small eyes. on one of those occasions i did see several short creatures with the large purple eyes looking at me. the tall one seems to be the abductor. the second time i saw the tall one it threw the sheets off of my feet at the foot of my bed. i remember it lightly slapping my feet. it was slightly hunched over looking at me with the little one scattered on both sides of it. that happened at my apartment in texas. while in greece, i don't know if it was returning me or trying to take me but i fought hard holding on to the couch with my rt leg and hand. it had me half way out of the large window that was as wide as i am tall.
i am heavily involved in the spiritual having done several exorcisms. i am a hypnotist. i have 2 degrees (math and biology) and a paper away from my ms in computer science. tests give me an iq of 154. i was working for intelligence when i believe it all started. for some reason or another i don't like to sleep at night no matter how tired and will stay up as late as possible. i am not scared to go to sleep just don't seem to want to.
i have many more details to each event but think they would be best spoken if there is any interest in them.
are these things happening to others?
thank you for your time.
content.summary: Abductions

content.detailedDescription:
It was tuesday 4th june 2013, 2am in the morning. 

i was in bed still awake as i couldnt sleep, and i just happened to see a light through the window blinds, and noticed it was moving.
i then jumped up and opened the blind to see it. i was right, it was moving. at first, i thought it was a plane or helicopter, but there was no flashing lights or noise, which made me think it might be a meteor, but it had no trail. 
the object was bright, brighter than a normal star, brighter than any star ive seen in the sky. it flew in a straight line, from west to east, and at a pace which i can only describe as faster than normal. it flew at a steady pace, but too fast for it to be a plane or helicopter. it was over the house and out of my view within 10-15 seconds. 
as soon as it went over the house and out of view i checked the time, which was 2am in the morning. my first thought after checking the time was 'have i just seen a ufo'. 
im not sure how many people saw this, or what it was, but i feel it was a ufo. if anyone saw this, please comment. it must have flew across the uk between 1am-3am, so somebody must have seen it. 
after that i went back to sleep knowing ive seen something strange that night. i cant wait to tell my friends and family.
content.summary: Bright light over doncaster

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
i realize this isn't much to report. but i have thought about it for many years and with information i've heard during that time i thought i should say something to somebody.
this event happened at night with a clear sky. i was standing outside my home when i saw a small travelling light in the sky which, at first, i thought may have been a plane. however, as i watched this light, travelling in the east, and moving in a southward direction, i noticed it slow dramatically, almost to a stop. within a few seconds the object shot straight up. it had made a very definite course change on a sharp angle. 
the object travelled for a very short period, (possibly one second), then disappeared with what appeared to be an explosion, or ???   something. the explosion did not make any sound. it only appeared to be explosive because there was a shower, or burst of sparks as it disappeared.
after that it was gone. 
it was not near to me as far as i could tell. it seemed to be a very long distance away. it also appeared as though it might have been in outer space,.... i'm not certain about that part.
the only reason i've had a concern about this object for so long is that i know we do not have any technology which would allow any air ships to make such a sharp turn. nor would it have disappeared so suddenly.
that very same night, one of our local television stations reported that local police and some eye witnesses in nashville had reported seeing a ufo. when this was reported i guess i put two and two together. it probably was the same object.
i cannot add anything more to this. as i said, i know it's not much. but i am confident that what i saw did not operate within the technologies we possess now, nor then.
i also have another report which happened at about the year of 1984 in another area of tennessee. however, i think that one may have been military. i'm not certain.
thanks for taking the time to read my e-mail and take my information. i wish i could add more or be more help.
randall
content.summary: A light travelling which changed directions abruptly, with sparks.

content.detailedDescription:
This event was actually part of a series of well over 200 events (mostly physic-like precognitive phenomena) that i'm witnessing over the last eight or nine months. although my father witnessed this particular event, i thought of "them" visiting the park he goes to and "they" showing him what he attempts to explain.

during sunset, and while my father and his friend were talking in the park, they both viewed an object that descended behind a tree. while staying stationary behind the upper portion of the tree, the object then flashed two red lights in sequence; emitting green light and then proceeded to cause lighting to strike. after doing so, the object left.

i can confirm that the lighting strike did happen, as i saw the clouds flash and heard the thunder from our apartment.
content.summary: Father sees ufo decend behind a treetop; watching it flash red lights on and off from behind the tree(s); it shows a green line or arrow and causes lighting to strike in the area near or above  the arrow; then takes off at impossible speed

content.detailedDescription:
National radar image.




ooo
content.summary: National radar image.

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon is already working on my cases.I'm reporting tonight's sightings for others who might of experienced the same orb sighting tonight especially those who live in north west alabama.Actually the gadsen report that came in prompted me to report online & i will have video of tonight's sighting on youtube shortly. the first light orb came in traveling low around close to 200-300 ft off the ground in straight path coming from the south heading north east.It was very very bright! brighter than sirius. it was moving extremely slow & about 5 mph. it took 4 minutes just to travel a few yards & over my yard.It was partly cloudy when this came over but was below the clouds. what's interesting, the gadsen report says he saw it going south west to north east but gadsen is southwest of north west alabama so logically it couldn't had been the same one.But with saying that we spotted a handful of other light orbs higher in the sky right after the low travelling orb & we saw them in all different directions. they will be medium bright & then get extremely bright all of a sudden & then dim & disappear.I noticed one of them still visible after thinking it was gone.They weave,wobble & hover sometimes & even make a curve in direction. 

anyway,i have a thought.Imagine a bunch of these low`orbs scattered in a horizonal line sweeping through our country at the same time headed in the same direction for instance, all coming from the south/ south west, headed in a north eastern direction? the light orbs that are a few thousand feet up are going in all directions. then again they might be all swarming up there & a few come down to say hi. the must like me a lot.
content.summary: Bright light orb observed in close range plus others in the distance.Linked with gadsen sighting?

content.detailedDescription:
On june 3rd around 22:45 - 23:00 hours while standing outside in driveway with fried, we noticed a relatively slow moving yellowish sphere moving silently through sky. we were intrigued that it was silent and had no commercial/collision lights.  object was traveling on a northern heading then turned east. at the same time, a what seemed to be a commercial aircraft flying west to east, went towards object at approximately same altitude, went around object and returned on a westerly heading. had normal jet sound but only a port side blinking light, object never altered course and never made a sound though object did "dim" then went back to original luminosity 

realatively clear evening, stars quite visible. minimal light pollution. no rain or fog. approx. 55 degrees
content.summary: Glowing sphere no sound. an airplane went towards object then went around object then turned west had sound one blinking light

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our way to the casino, and on 101 north approximately 30 min from home.  we were approaching out exit to the casino and my boyfriend said to me look what is that on top of the casino, which you are able to see from the freeway.  i looked and i seen a big glowing ball, i said to him " i am going to take a picture ok" he said sure.  as i took the exit to do so, all of a sudden my vehicle shut down and all my interior lights including my car stereo went out as if there were no power, i started to panic because i wasn't sure what was going on and my car only had 3,000 miles on it.  i said to him what is happening?  he didn't respond and i told him to get the time and then as i started to approach the stop sign my vehicle was on and my stereo lights and dash lights came back on.  it was as if the power came on but not like my vehicle started it was just back on.  i then proceeded to pull over to take pictures of the object and my boyfriend did also the object was a bright white but once i started to take pictures it turned orange and then started towards us.  no sooner i took out my phone to take them, my boyfriend said to me "  hey i don't know what the heck it is but whatever it is, it is coming straight for us, i laughed as i thought he was joking, i continued to take photos but i was only seeing my shutter open and close. my boyfriend started to put his phone away and said lets go its coming fast, he said i am getting out and going to walk i am not trying to get abducted.   i have taken lots of pictures of orbs, and sphere's and other unidentified  objects and thought this was one for my photo album.  i continued to take photos and my boyfriend became uneasy and asked if we could go,  i again chuckled and said ok just a few more.  so i took a few more pictures and then proceeded on to the casino.  we arrived at the casino about 10:50 or 11:00 pm, and we got out of my vehicle and i was unable to stand without holding on to my boyfriend, i told him that i felt weak and my legs were very weak, and so we went on the elevator and my head felt as if i were on a merry go round for hours, almost as if my brain was spinning and as we got off the elevator i then had to stop i told him i had to vomit and i thought we needed to leave and go to the hospital, i asked him how did he feel and he said "not good i need to vomit to"  as i stood there i became very scared and said i don't know what is going on but i am weak, he told me to hold on to him and lets sit down inside then we can go if i didn't feel any better.  i then remember being in front of the casino, but have no memory of what i did inside or how long before i felt better. once we got home i connected my phone to my computer to see what we got in the photos.  i looked at all the pictures and i had to lighten them because i wasn't able to see them.  as i lightened them  i was able to see the object as it approached us it was a lighted rod coming in multiple directions meaning left to right but as is approached us it had passed in front of a couple of vehicles that were passing by in actually passed right over the rear end of a vehicle, and i have a few photos of it coming straight for us, then i have a photo of a green object coming towards my vehicle and my boyfriend took pictures of the object and then an object with windows also my speedometer reads that while at a complete stop my vehicle states it is a 60 mph and my rpm's are at 3.  my boyfriend accidentally took photos of inside my vehicle and there is a cigar like object in my car and my car clock was a fluorescent green and bright. this object seems to have a red color in the top of it and in the center of it.   once the object go closer to my car the surrounding area became clouded as if there were a dust storm, i was unable to see the road and in one photo the object that had windows in it, the lines in the road were like they were all over the place they were no longer the painted line that were there at the beginning of this ordeal.  i do have all the photos which i had to lighten.  i am willing to take a polygraph test for my boyfriend and i,  i will pay for them myself if necessary.  i am also willing to go under hypnosis if possible, i believe they abducted us and i have some type of implant in my abdominal area.  since this encounter i have a burn like mark on my stomach and i can feel it move on occasion which if feels like a sharp object  poking me i have actually felt it travel around my stomach area and when i experienced this that night i  had felt it and i am very scared of not knowing what they did.  i hope we can discuss this or maybe you can direct me to the right individuals for the hypnosis and polygraph.  i am scared and no one believes us.  

thank you so much

annette gonzales
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Seen object on building stopped to take picture then it started towards us and we then proceeded on to the casino and were both very ill, and confused

content.detailedDescription: Over the past three years i've noticed that in june and july things really start picking up in our night sky. tonight was an amazing night to go out for stargazing. as i looked up, i thought at first i was looking at just stars. then i realized, they were moving. as they passed, i pointed them out to my friends and my children. at first they thought they were looking at just the stars too, but once they focused they noticed a bunch of objects were moving in the night sky. there were no clouds in the sky, so it was not an illusion or our minds playing tricks on us. my daughter decided to take my phone and use the flashlight on it on one of the objects to try to communicate with one of them by flashing the light on and off again and it worked! we then went inside and got a normal flash light, they did not respond back but did with the phone. for three and half hours my daughter and i counted over 25 objects flying in the night sky disguised as stars. we also noticed when a plane would fly by, they would put their light out or would just disappear entirely. i can surely say that what we were seeing tonight was not airplanes or an aircraft that is of our world.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Some were bright white round objects and others were dull white that blended in well with the stars

content.detailedDescription:
In 1997, my wife and i saw a large black triangle of size 3 or 4 passenger jets (type boing), passed over our house at the time, later moving slowly became translucent and vanished into thin air. at the bottom of the object light orange had ring-shaped edge throughout the several rings on the edge and bottom. all the rest of the structure was black. it made no noise nehum. my wife and i could not leave the place, i can not assess the time of observation. the sky was very clear and cloudless starry, there was no moon in the sky, at least from our position. i know very well all types of aircraft, satellites, etc.. it was bizarre.

hellington
content.summary: Huge black triangle
